segments.source_content:
---
description: How to install Docusaurus locally, and start a Docusaurus site in no time.
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Installation

translations.zh-CN: # 安装

segments.source_content:
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_10c4cb47

segments.source_content: Docusaurus consists of a set of npm [packages](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages).

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 由一组 npm [包](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages)组成。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use the **[Fast Track](introduction.mdx#fast-track)** to understand Docusaurus in **5 minutes ⏱**!

Use **[docusaurus.new](https://docusaurus.new)** to test Docusaurus immediately in your browser!

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

使用 **[快速入门指南](introduction.mdx#fast-track)**，**5分钟⏱** 快速了解 Docusaurus！

访问 **[docusaurus.new](https://docusaurus.new)** 立即在浏览器中体验 Docusaurus！

:::

segments.source_content: ## Requirements {#requirements}

translations.zh-CN: ## 环境要求 {#requirements}

segments.source_content:
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) version 18.0 or above (which can be checked by running `node -v`). You can use [nvm](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm) to manage multiple Node.js versions on a single machine.
  - When installing Node.js, it is recommended to check all checkboxes related to dependencies.

translations.zh-CN:
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) 版本 18.0 或更高（可通过运行 `node -v` 查看）。可使用 [nvm](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm) 管理单机上的多个 Node.js 版本。
  - 安装 Node.js 时，建议勾选所有与依赖项相关的复选框。

segments.source_content: ## Scaffold project website {#scaffold-project-website}

translations.zh-CN: ## 初始化项目网站 {#scaffold-project-website}

segments.source_content: The easiest way to install Docusaurus is to use the [`create-docusaurus`](./api/misc/create-docusaurus.mdx) command line tool that helps you scaffold a skeleton Docusaurus website. You can run this command anywhere in a new empty repository or within an existing repository, it will create a new directory containing the scaffolded files.

translations.zh-CN: 安装 Docusaurus 最简单的方式是使用 [`create-docusaurus`](./api/misc/create-docusaurus.mdx) 命令行工具，它能快速生成 Docusaurus 网站骨架。您可以在新仓库或现有仓库的任何空目录下运行此命令，它将创建一个包含初始化文件的新目录。

segments.source_content:
```bash
npx create-docusaurus@latest my-website classic
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0c911872

segments.source_content: We recommend the `classic` template so that you can get started quickly, and it contains features found in Docusaurus 1. The `classic` template contains `@docusaurus/preset-classic` which includes standard documentation, a blog, custom pages, and a CSS framework (with dark mode support). You can get up and running extremely quickly with the classic template and customize things later on when you have gained more familiarity with Docusaurus.

translations.zh-CN: 我们推荐使用 `classic` 模板快速上手，它包含了 Docusaurus 1 的核心功能。该模板内置的 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 包含标准文档系统、博客功能、自定义页面以及支持暗色模式的 CSS 框架。通过经典模板可极速搭建网站，待熟悉 Docusaurus 后再进行深度定制。

segments.source_content: You can also use the template's TypeScript variant by passing the `--typescript` flag. See [TypeScript support](./typescript-support.mdx) for more information.

translations.zh-CN: 您也可以通过 `--typescript` 参数使用 TypeScript 变体模板。详见 [TypeScript 支持文档](./typescript-support.mdx)。

segments.source_content:
```bash
npx create-docusaurus@latest my-website classic --typescript
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_be2d5397

segments.source_content:
:::info[Meta-Only]

If you are setting up a new Docusaurus website for a Meta open source project, run this command inside an internal repository, which comes with some useful Meta-specific defaults:

```bash
scarf static-docs-bootstrap
```

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[Meta专属]

如果您正在为 Meta 开源项目创建新的 Docusaurus 网站，请在内部仓库中运行此命令，该命令会附带一些 Meta 专属的默认配置：

```bash
scarf static-docs-bootstrap
```

:::

segments.source_content:
<details>
  <summary>Alternative installation commands</summary>

You can also initialize a new project using your preferred project manager:

```bash npm2yarn
npm init docusaurus
```

</details>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_8e90ad3a

segments.source_content: Run `npx create-docusaurus@latest --help`, or check out its [API docs](./api/misc/create-docusaurus.mdx) for more information about all available flags.

translations.zh-CN: 运行 `npx create-docusaurus@latest --help` 或查阅其 [API 文档](./api/misc/create-docusaurus.mdx) 可查看所有可用参数说明。

segments.source_content: ## Project structure {#project-structure}

translations.zh-CN: ## 项目结构 {#project-structure}

segments.source_content: Assuming you chose the classic template and named your site `my-website`, you will see the following files generated under a new directory `my-website/`:

translations.zh-CN: 假设您选择经典模板并将站点命名为 `my-website`，将在新建的 `my-website/` 目录下看到以下文件：

segments.source_content:
```bash
my-website
├── blog
│   ├── 2019-05-28-hola.md
│   ├── 2019-05-29-hello-world.md
│   └── 2020-05-30-welcome.md
├── docs
│   ├── doc1.md
│   ├── doc2.md
│   ├── doc3.md
│   └── mdx.md
├── src
│   ├── css
│   │   └── custom.css
│   └── pages
│       ├── styles.module.css
│       └── index.js
├── static
│   └── img
├── docusaurus.config.js
├── package.json
├── README.md
├── sidebars.js
└── yarn.lock
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_67b24fc5

segments.source_content: ### Project structure rundown {#project-structure-rundown}

translations.zh-CN: ### 项目结构详解 {#project-structure-rundown}

segments.source_content:
- `/blog/` - Contains the blog Markdown files. You can delete the directory if you've disabled the blog plugin, or you can change its name after setting the `path` option. More details can be found in the [blog guide](blog.mdx)
- `/docs/` - Contains the Markdown files for the docs. Customize the order of the docs sidebar in `sidebars.js`. You can delete the directory if you've disabled the docs plugin, or you can change its name after setting the `path` option. More details can be found in the [docs guide](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx)
- `/src/` - Non-documentation files like pages or custom React components. You don't have to strictly put your non-documentation files here, but putting them under a centralized directory makes it easier to specify in case you need to do some sort of linting/processing
  - `/src/pages` - Any JSX/TSX/MDX file within this directory will be converted into a website page. More details can be found in the [pages guide](guides/creating-pages.mdx)
- `/static/` - Static directory. Any contents inside here will be copied into the root of the final `build` directory
- `/docusaurus.config.js` - A config file containing the site configuration. This is the equivalent of `siteConfig.js` in Docusaurus v1
- `/package.json` - A Docusaurus website is a React app. You can install and use any npm packages you like in them
- `/sidebars.js` - Used by the documentation to specify the order of documents in the sidebar

translations.zh-CN:
- `/blog/` - 存放博客的 Markdown 文件。如果禁用了博客插件可以删除该目录，或通过设置 `path` 选项修改目录名称。更多细节请参阅[博客指南](blog.mdx)
- `/docs/` - 存放文档的 Markdown 文件。侧边栏顺序可通过 `sidebars.js` 自定义。如果禁用了文档插件可以删除该目录，或通过设置 `path` 选项修改目录名称。更多细节请参阅[文档指南](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx)
- `/src/` - 非文档类文件（如页面或自定义 React 组件）。虽然不强制要求将非文档文件放在此处，但集中存放便于进行代码检查或处理
  - `/src/pages` - 该目录下的所有 JSX/TSX/MDX 文件都将转换为网站页面。详情参见[页面指南](guides/creating-pages.mdx)
- `/static/` - 静态资源目录。该目录下所有内容会被直接复制到最终构建的 `build` 目录根路径
- `/docusaurus.config.js` - 站点配置文件，相当于 Docusaurus v1 中的 `siteConfig.js`
- `/package.json` - Docusaurus 网站本质是 React 应用，可以安装使用任意 npm 包
- `/sidebars.js` - 用于定义文档侧边栏的排序规则

segments.source_content: ### Monorepos {#monorepos}

translations.zh-CN: ### 单体仓库（Monorepos）{#monorepos}

segments.source_content: If you are using Docusaurus for documentation of an existing project, a monorepo may be the solution for you. Monorepos allow you to share dependencies between similar projects. For example, your website may use your local packages to showcase latest features instead of depending on a released version. Then, your contributors can update the docs as they implement features. An example monorepo folder structure is below:

translations.zh-CN: 若需为现有项目编写文档，采用单体仓库可能是理想方案。该架构允许在相关项目间共享依赖项，例如网站可直接引用本地包来展示最新功能（而非依赖发布版本），这样贡献者就能在开发功能时同步更新文档。以下是单体仓库的示例目录结构：

segments.source_content:
```bash
my-monorepo
├── package-a # Another package, your actual project
│   ├── src
│   └── package.json # Package A's dependencies
├── website   # Docusaurus root
│   ├── docs
│   ├── src
│   └── package.json # Docusaurus' dependencies
├── package.json # Monorepo's shared dependencies
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c9873cf8

segments.source_content: In this case, you should run `npx create-docusaurus` within the `./my-monorepo` folder.

translations.zh-CN: 这种情况下，应在 `./my-monorepo` 目录内执行 `npx create-docusaurus` 命令。

segments.source_content: If you're using a hosting provider such as Netlify or Vercel, you will need to change the `Base directory` of the site to where your Docusaurus root is. In this case, that would be `./website`. Read more about configuring ignore commands in the [deployment docs](./deployment.mdx#deploying-to-netlify).

translations.zh-CN: 若使用 Netlify 或 Vercel 等托管服务，需将站点的「基础目录」设置为 Docusaurus 根目录（本例中为 `./website`）。关于忽略命令配置的更多说明，请参阅[部署文档](./deployment.mdx#deploying-to-netlify)。

segments.source_content: Read more about monorepos in the [Yarn documentation](https://yarnpkg.com/features/workspaces) (Yarn is not the only way to set up a monorepo, but it's a common solution), or checkout [Docusaurus](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus) and [Jest](https://github.com/facebook/jest) for some real-world examples.

translations.zh-CN: 更多关于单体仓库的内容可查阅 [Yarn 文档](https://yarnpkg.com/features/workspaces)（Yarn 并非唯一解决方案，但属于常见方式），或参考 [Docusaurus](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus) 与 [Jest](https://github.com/facebook/jest) 的实际案例。

segments.source_content: ## Running the development server {#running-the-development-server}

translations.zh-CN: ## 启动开发服务器 {#running-the-development-server}

segments.source_content: To preview your changes as you edit the files, you can run a local development server that will serve your website and reflect the latest changes.

translations.zh-CN: 要实时预览文件修改效果，可运行本地开发服务器来托管网站并同步最新变更。

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
cd my-website
npm run start
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5be4f25e

segments.source_content: By default, a browser window will open at [`http://localhost:3000`](http://localhost:3000).

translations.zh-CN: 默认会自动打开浏览器访问 [`http://localhost:3000`](http://localhost:3000)。

segments.source_content: Congratulations! You have just created your first Docusaurus site! Browse around the site to see what's available.

translations.zh-CN: 恭喜！您已成功创建首个 Docusaurus 站点！请浏览站点熟悉各项功能。

segments.source_content: ## Build {#build}

translations.zh-CN: ## 构建 {#build}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is a modern static website generator so we need to build the website into a directory of static contents and put it on a web server so that it can be viewed. To build the website:

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 是现代化的静态网站生成器，需将网站构建为静态文件目录并部署到 Web 服务器才能访问。执行构建命令：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run build
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_01a167f4

segments.source_content: and contents will be generated within the `/build` directory, which can be copied to any static file hosting service like [GitHub pages](https://pages.github.com/), [Vercel](https://vercel.com/) or [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/). Check out the docs on [deployment](deployment.mdx) for more details.

translations.zh-CN: 构建产物将生成在 `/build` 目录内，可将其部署到任意静态托管服务如 [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/)、[Vercel](https://vercel.com/) 或 [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/)。更多细节请参阅[部署文档](deployment.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ## Updating your Docusaurus version {#updating-your-docusaurus-version}

translations.zh-CN: ## 更新 Docusaurus 版本 {#updating-your-docusaurus-version}

segments.source_content: There are many ways to update your Docusaurus version. One guaranteed way is to manually change the version number in `package.json` to the desired version. Note that all `@docusaurus/`-namespaced packages should be using the same version.

translations.zh-CN: 更新 Docusaurus 版本有多种方式。最可靠的方法是手动修改 `package.json` 中的版本号为期望值。请注意所有 `@docusaurus/` 命名空间下的包应保持版本一致。

segments.source_content: import UpgradeGuide from '@site/src/components/UpgradeGuide';

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1cd4889a

segments.source_content: <UpgradeGuide />

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_817eb4a8

segments.source_content: Then, in the directory containing `package.json`, run your package manager's install command:

translations.zh-CN: 然后在包含 `package.json` 的目录中，运行包管理器的安装命令：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5680b15c

segments.source_content:
:::tip

`npm install` may report several vulnerabilities and recommend running `npm audit` to address them. Typically, these reported vulnerabilities, such as RegExp DOS vulnerabilities, are harmless and can be safely ignored. Also read this article, which reflects our thinking: [npm audit: Broken by Design](https://overreacted.io/npm-audit-broken-by-design/).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

`npm install` 可能会报告若干漏洞并建议运行 `npm audit` 修复。通常这些被报告的漏洞（如正则表达式拒绝服务漏洞）是无害的，可以安全忽略。另请阅读这篇反映我们观点的文章：[npm audit: Broken by Design](https://overreacted.io/npm-audit-broken-by-design/)。

:::

segments.source_content: To check that the update occurred successfully, run:

translations.zh-CN: 要验证更新是否成功，请运行：

segments.source_content:
```bash
npx docusaurus --version
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_90c0aa8a

segments.source_content: You should see the correct version as output.

translations.zh-CN: 您应该能看到正确的版本号输出。

segments.source_content: Alternatively, if you are using Yarn, you can do:

translations.zh-CN: 如果使用 Yarn，也可以执行：

segments.source_content:
```bash
yarn add @docusaurus/core @docusaurus/preset-classic
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_82a37a1b

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use new unreleased features of Docusaurus with the [`@canary` npm dist tag](/community/canary)

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

通过 [`@canary` npm 分发标签](/community/canary) 使用 Docusaurus 未发布的新功能

:::

segments.source_content: ## Problems? {#problems}

translations.zh-CN: ## 遇到问题？ {#problems}

segments.source_content: Ask for help on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/docusaurus), on our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus), our [Discord server](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus), or [X](https://x.com/docusaurus).

translations.zh-CN: 请在 [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/docusaurus)、我们的 [GitHub 仓库](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus)、[Discord 服务器](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus) 或 [X](https://x.com/docusaurus) 上寻求帮助。
